1.title: Atlassian + Trello: changing the way teams work - Atlassian Blogs
1.text: We're thrilled to announce our agreement to acquire Trello! Learn more about our plans to add their amazing product to our growing family.
1.fallback: Atlassian Blogs: Atlassian + Trello: changing the way teams work - Atlassian Blogs

purpose.5: Overview, news, new features etc. for internal pm use

text.0:
Som vi også snakkede om sidst.. Lad os give Trello et forsøg, og fortsætte med at bruge det som pm værktøj. Men fremadrettet sørge for at alligne vores boards og cards. Alle cards bør, som minimum indeholde: 
1. Defined labels 
2. Assigned/Members
3. Due date  
:laughing:
text.5: <@U321CN2N7|abedkreidly> set the channel purpose: Overview, news, new features etc. for internal pm use
